second_reading.text:
[[1_Th 5,16]]Rejoice always.
[[1_Th 5,17]]Pray without ceasing.
[[1_Th 5,18]]In all circumstances give thanks, for this is the will of God for you in Christ Jesus.
[[1_Th 5,19]]Do not quench the Spirit.
[[1_Th 5,20]]Do not despise prophetic utterances.
[[1_Th 5,21]]Test everything; retain what is good.
[[1_Th 5,22]]Refrain from every kind of evil.
[[1_Th 5,23]]May the God of peace himself make you perfectly holy and may you entirely, spirit, soul, and body, be preserved blameless for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
[[1_Th 5,24]]The one who calls you is faithful, and he will also accomplish it.
second_reading.title: First Letter to the Thessalonians

psalm.text:
[[Lc 1,46]]Mary said: "My soul proclaims the greatness of the Lord;
[[Lc 1,47]]my spirit rejoices in God my savior.
[[Lc 1,48]]For he has looked with favor on his lowly servant; 
from this day all generations will call me blessed.

[[Lc 1,49]]The Almighty has done great things for me, 
and holy is his name.
[[Lc 1,50]]He has mercy on those who fear him
in every generation.

[[Lc 1,53]]He has filled the hungry with good things; 
and the rich he has sent away empty.
[[Lc 1,54]]He has come to the help of his servant Israel , 
remembering his promise of mercy,
psalm.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke

gospel.text:
[[Jn 1,6]]A man named John was sent from God.
[[Jn 1,7]]He came for testimony, to testify to the light, so that all might believe through him.
[[Jn 1,8]]He was not the light, but came to testify to the light.
[[Jn 1,19]]And this is the testimony of John. When the Jews from Jerusalem sent priests and Levites (to him) to ask him, "Who are you?"
[[Jn 1,20]]he admitted and did not deny it, but admitted, "I am not the Messiah."
[[Jn 1,21]]So they asked him, "What are you then? Are you Elijah?" And he said, "I am not." "Are you the Prophet?" He answered, "No."
[[Jn 1,22]]So they said to him, "Who are you, so we can give an answer to those who sent us? What do you have to say for yourself?"
[[Jn 1,23]]He said: "I am 'the voice of one crying out in the desert, "Make straight the way of the Lord,"' as Isaiah the prophet said."
[[Jn 1,24]]Some Pharisees were also sent.
[[Jn 1,25]]They asked him, "Why then do you baptize if you are not the Messiah or Elijah or the Prophet?"
[[Jn 1,26]]John answered them, "I baptize with water; but there is one among you whom you do not recognize,
[[Jn 1,27]]the one who is coming after me, whose sandal strap I am not worthy to untie."
[[Jn 1,28]]This happened in Bethany across the Jordan, where John was baptizing.
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint John

first_reading.text:
[[Is 61,1]]The spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me, because the LORD has anointed me; He has sent me to bring glad tidings to the lowly, to heal the brokenhearted, To proclaim liberty to the captives and release to the prisoners,
[[Is 61,2a]]To announce a year of favor from the LORD and a day of vindication by our God, to comfort all who mourn;
[[Is 61,10]]I rejoice heartily in the LORD, in my God is the joy of my soul; For he has clothed me with a robe of salvation, and wrapped me in a mantle of justice, Like a bridegroom adorned with a diadem, like a bride bedecked with her jewels.
[[Is 61,11]]As the earth brings forth its plants, and a garden makes its growth spring up, So will the Lord GOD make justice and praise spring up before all the nations.
first_reading.title: Book of Isaiah
